body: A Connecticut man who investigators say propositioned a 13-year-old girl for sex over the Internet was arrested in Brooklyn on Monday as he headed to a seaside rendezvous with the girl, prosecutors said yesterday. The man, James Barrows, 55, of Madison, Conn., was charged in Brooklyn Criminal Court yesterday with attempting to disseminate indecent
title: Connecticut Man Finds E-Mail 'Date' Isn't a Girl, Isn't 13 and Has a Badge

body: The sun peeked out, floodwaters receded, transit and travel resumed and the World Series finally got under way yesterday as the metropolitan area's worst rainstorm in years churned off, leaving almost 52,000 homes still without power, widespread damage from water and wind-toppled trees, and four storm-related deaths. title: Storm Floods Many Areas And Kills 4
